mapper.select: select t2.* from (select n.num seq ,n.title title ,n.content content ,DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') regDate ,n.customer_seq customerSeq from notice n ) t2 where t2.seq between #{start} and #{end} order by t2.seq asc
select count(*) as count from notice
select count(*) as count from notice where ${keyField} like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

select t2.* from (select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS seq ,n.title ,n.content content ,DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') regDate ,n.customer_seq customerSeq from customer n ,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R where ${keyField} like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') and n.id is null and n.role = 'NOTICE' )t2 where t2.seq between #{start} and #{end} order by t2.seq asc
